summary: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.
cast: Freddie Highmore|Mary-Louise Parker|Nick Nolte|Sarah Bolger|Andrew McCarthy|Joan Plowright|David Strathairn|Seth Rogen|Martin Short|Jordy Benattar|Tod Fennell|Mariah Inger|Jeremy Lavalley|Lise Durocher-Viens|Tyler Patrick Jones|Kyle Switzer|Stefanie Broos|Ron Perlman
title: Las crónicas de Spiderwick
